tasks.task: Design and implement a vertical farming system to reduce the carbon footprint of food production.
subtasks: Research and select environmentally friendly building materials for constructing buildings suitable for vertical farming.
Investigate methods to reduce energy consumption in vertical farms, such as passive solar design and energy-efficient lighting.
Explore the use of nano films and membranes to improve water conservation and cleaning in vertical farms.
Examine the potential for genetic engineering to create crop varieties suitable for vertical farming conditions.
Evaluate the economic and practical feasibility of vertical farming in comparison to traditional agriculture.
Address potential challenges in adjusting diets to accommodate crops best suited for vertical farming.
Consider the role of agribusiness and public investment in the adoption of vertical farming technology.

tasks.task: Promote the adoption of vertical farming in urban areas to reduce the distance between food production and consumption.
subtasks: Develop policies and incentives to encourage the construction of vertical farms in cities.
Collaborate with urban planners to integrate vertical farming into the design of new and existing buildings.
Educate consumers and urban populations about the benefits of vertical farming and its potential to reduce food transport costs and environmental impact.
Address potential concerns from existing agricultural industries about the displacement of traditional farming practices.
Identify and overcome regulatory barriers to the implementation of vertical farming in urban areas.

tasks.task: Optimize the efficiency and sustainability of vertical farms through technological advancements.
subtasks: Test the use of fibre optics in providing energy-efficient light for vertical farms.
Investigate the integration of public transit and private pedal power in providing sustainable transportation options for urban dwellers.
Explore the potential of high-density living and teleworking to reduce the carbon footprint of urban areas.
Assess the impact of vertical farming on cooling urban heat islands and reducing the urban heat effect.
Monitor and evaluate the progress of vertical farming initiatives to improve future design and implementation.
